Text: Enron to Kick Off National Employee Health and Fitness Week with Clyde DrexlerFpst Get ready to help the Body Shop celebrate its th anniversary and kick off National Health and Fitness Week Beginning Monday May and ending Friday May all Enron Employees are invited to workout at the Body Shop as a complimentary guest Just visit wellness print and fillout the body shop th anniversary guest form and return it to the Body Shop prior to your first workout The week long celebration includes a speech and autograph session with Clyde Drexler Monday May AM noon spaces will be limited and you must RSVP to by Friday May PM an early morning workout with the Houston Rockets Power Girls on Thursday May starting at AM followed by breakfast and autograph session in the Body Shop Fuel Station at am am a boot camp style class led by the GermanAmerican Foreign Legion and much much more Visit the Body Shop website for a detailed calendar of events or for additional information please email the Body Shop at
